means: 放纵( indulge的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We indulged in an expensive supper after the concert.
sentence.Network_cn: 音乐会后我们尽情地享受了一顿昂贵的晚餐.

sentence.Network_en: They got together and indulged in wine and song.
His mother indulged him in material possession.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的母亲纵容他,总是给他买这买那.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2008年1月的SAT真题解析-sat阅读培训-教育联展网 ... harshly 粗糙的 indulged 使沉溺于 prematurely 草率的.
He seldom indulged in a holiday ., 他难得欢度假日.
She indulged in a fit of temper ., 她任性地发了一通脾气.
As an overnight multimillionaire , Post indulged himself with lavish and sometimes bizarre spending sprees ., 一夜之间成了千万富翁 , 柏斯特放纵自己挥霍无度 , 有时候甚至陷于怪异的花钱狂热中.

list.abs: 纵字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 纵然〖 evenif;eventhough〗 纵容〖 indulge;pamper;connive;winkat〗 纵身〖 jump;leap〗.
Carácter « 所 » - Dicionário de sinogramas ... 在所不惜[ will not grudge] 恣心所欲[ indulge oneself] ( 厕所 )[ toilet].
恣意_百度百科 ... [behave recklessly] 肆意作为,无所顾忌 [indulge oneself] 恣纵己意,心想事成.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译英语词汇网 -... ... plenarily 充分地 plenary indulgence 大赦 plenary 无限的.
节假日来袭：10种方式教你一个... ... 7. Volunteer 当志愿者 8. Indulge yourself 犒劳自己 9. Random Act of Kindness 做点善事.

entry.def: If you indulge in something or if you indulge yourself, you allow yourself to have or do something that you know you will enjoy.

example.ex: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine...
example.tran: 她只是偶尔才喝杯红酒,让自己享受一下。

example.ex: He returned to Britain so that he could indulge his passion for football...
example.tran: 他重返英国，为的是可以尽情释放自己对足球的激情。

entry.def: If you indulge someone, you let them have or do what they want, even if this is not good for them.

example.ex: He did not agree with indulging children.

auth_sentence.content: Queen Elizabeth...frequently indulged herself in following of the hounds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Queen Elizabeth...frequently indulged herself in following of the hounds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Queen Elizabeth...frequently indulged herself in following of the hounds.

auth_sentence.content: Could he have indulged in one tortilla too many?
auth_sentence.res_content: Could he have indulged in one tortilla too many?

auth_sentence.content: The article also seems to have indulged in considerable editorialising.
auth_sentence.res_content: The article also seems to have indulged in considerable editorialising.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The article also seems to have indulged in considerable editorialising.
